title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Digital Logic Design Practical Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental electronics and logic circuit theory
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operational principles of five basic logic gates (AND, OR, NOT, NAND, NOR) and draw circuit diagrams.
Learners can implement and simulate a 4-bit adder circuit in HDL code based on given design requirements.
Learners can evaluate the applicability of actual digital systems by completing a sequential circuit design project utilizing flip-flops and registers
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
